name: Box Bots (Beta)
description:
Info

Play as a knight adventuring through a wild world full of box-bots.  Swing your sword at them to turn them into boxes which you can pickup, place down, and throw around.  Complete puzzles and try to get to each level's teleporter.  Be careful not to run out of health due to bots or spikes!

Box Bots contains 20 levels.

Controls

Use the arrow keys or WASD to move around.

Use the space bar to jump.

Use the Z/C keys to swing your sword.

Use the X/V keys to pickup, place, and throw boxes.

To place a box, press the pickup button while holding a box.

To throw a box, press the pickup button and up button while holding a box.

Press the R key to restart the level.

Credits

Programming, SFX - ChrisRollsDice

Art, Music, Level Design - Pikablock

Made in Two Weeks for the LOWREZJAM 2021!
